text:
In today's lesson with The Big Bang Theory, 
we'll learn with three of the main protagonists,
Sheldon, Leonard, and Penny.

In the series, Sheldon Cooper is a brilliant scientist
and researcher who is a very difficult person
to deal with socially.

As you'll see he always chooses difficult words
and talks very fast,

so don't feel discouraged if you
struggle to understand him at first,

as following his speech is sometimes hard
even for native English speakers.

For this reason, this will be a good opportunity
to learn new words and some specific vocabulary

that is not so common to hear but that will 
definitely help you gain English fluency .

Plus, increase your comprehension
 of English humor and sarcasm.

So are you ready?
Let's do it!

Every week we make learning fun so that
you can understand fast-speaking natives

without getting lost,
without missing the jokes,
and without subtitles.

In fact, Fasahat said that they can remember
all of the words thanks to our fun clips.

And you can too! All you have to do
is remember to hit that Subscribe button

and the bell down below so you
don't miss any of our new lessons.

so that you can understand natives?
